data.name: Readable developer-friendly large numbers
data.description:
# Readable developer-friendly large numbers

## Summary

Add support for easily creating large numbers using [orders of magnitude](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Orders_of_magnitude_%28numbers%29):
 * `hundred`
 * `thousand`
 * `million`
 * `billion`
 * `trillion`
 * `quadrillion`
 * `quintillion`
 * `sextillion`
 * `septillion`
 * `octillion`
 * `nonillion`
 * `decillion`

```if:javascript
Do this by extending the built-in `Number` class.
```

## Examples

```rb
# should return 100
1.hundred

# should return 10_000_000
10.million
```
```javascript
// should return 100
Number(1).hundred();

// should return 10000000
Number(10).million();
```

## Notes

 * Your solution should work for integers and floats.
 * Use the [short scale](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Long_and_short_scales) numbering system (`1,000,000,000` is a billion).
